Title: Provides that no policy of group accident, group health or group accident and health shall impose copayments for physical or occupational therapy greater than copays for similar services provided by a physician
Summary: Provides that no policy of group accident, group health or group accident and health shall impose copayments for physical or occupational therapy greater than the copay for similar services provided by a physician.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to physical therapy services
